== Thrippunithura (M) (803290) ==

Thrippunithura (M) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 18.69 sq. km. and harbouring 18096 households with total population of 69390 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 240 km. Male population is 33918 and female population is 35472. Scheduled Caste population is 6547 and Scheduled Tribes population is 166. Census Location Code of the town is 803290<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 8 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 8 km. Railway station is at Thrippunithura at a distance of 0 km.
